item.title: Trump's back-to-office order will hurt veterans, VA docs and therapists say
item.description: The Department of Veterans Affairs embraced telehealth, especially for mental health care, in recent years. Now, staffers hired to give therapy and other health care remotely are ordered to do it from offices lacking privacy, VA clinicians told NPR.

item.title: Doctors still seeking cure for brain cancer that struck former Utah Rep. Mia Love
item.description: Mia Love, the first Black Republican woman elected to Congress, died three years after being diagnosed with glioblastoma, a brain cancer that is nearly always fatal.
